categories.name: Most valued JavaScript Open source project
categories.description: An award intended to recognize outstanding JavaScript open-source projects within the JavaScript community in Ireland. This award is presented to the authors and core maintainers (individuals or businesses) for the positive impact generated by their efforts.

categories.name: Most valued JavaScript Open source contributor (individual)
categories.description: An award intended to recognize outstanding JavaScript open-source contributors by individuals within the JavaScript community in Ireland. This award is presented to individuals for dedication, innovation, leadership and exceptional contribution to open source.

categories.name: Most valued JavaScript Open source contributor (business)
categories.description: An award intended to recognize outstanding JavaScript open-source contributors by businesses within the JavaScript community in Ireland. This award is presented to individuals for dedication, innovation, leadership and exceptional contribution to open source.

categories.name: Most valued JavaScript community member (individual)
categories.description: An award intended to recognize outstanding community leaders within the JavaScript community in Ireland. This award is presented to individuals for the incredible impact of their contributions (talks, social media posts, books, etc.) to the community.

categories.name: Most valued JavaScript community member (business)
categories.description: An award intended to recognize outstanding community leaders within the JavaScript community in Ireland. This award is presented to businesses for the incredible impact of their contributions (talks, social media posts, books, etc.) to the community.

categories.name: Most valued JavaScript recruitment agency in Ireland
categories.description: An award intended to recognize the recruitment agencies that share valuable insights about employment trends within our community and go the extra mile to ensure that the members of the JavaScript community land their dream job.

categories.name: Best place to work with JavaScript in Ireland
categories.description: An award intended to recognize businesses within the JavaScript community in Ireland that empower JavaScript developers to thrive. Employees are encouraged to nominate their employers for creating high-trust, high-performance company cultures.

categories.name: JSDayIE 2023's best talk/speaker of the day
categories.description: An award intended to recognize the best talk of the day at JSDayIE 2023. The event attendees are encouraged to nominate the talks or speakers that demonstrated excellent communication skills and shared valuable insights about the JavaScript ecosystem.
